CoffeeShops.name: The Kind Project
CoffeeShops.description: We’re on a mission to make the world a little kinder.

CoffeeShops.name: Gilli Café
CoffeeShops.description: Come see us for the best coffee and food with our friendly staff on hand!
comments: in and out like a breeze

CoffeeShops.name: Carlton Gore Cafe
CoffeeShops.description: Cosmopolitan counter-serve hub with a bright, airy feel serving coffee, upscale light fare & wine.
comments: Coffee was cold. Food was average
I’m a sucker for chai lattes and they’ve got me sorted here 😝😍.

CoffeeShops.name: New Century Cafe
comments: recommend if you don't want higher priced food

CoffeeShops.name: Sip Kitchen
CoffeeShops.description: Sip Kitchen is a whole-food eatery & creator of delicious, nutrient-dense food and beverages.
comments: as a vegetarian this place is a diamond in the rough with 95% of the food on offer either vegan or vegetarian.
Greenie in a Bottle is must-have if you're a green juice fan!
